events.name: MarketingCampaignCreated
events.description: This event signifies the initiation of a new marketing campaign.

events.name: MarketingCampaignUpdated
events.description: This event indicates that an existing marketing campaign has been updated.

events.name: MarketingCampaignLaunched
events.description: This event represents the launch of a marketing campaign to the public.

events.name: MarketingCampaignCompleted
events.description: This event signifies the completion of a marketing campaign.

commands.name: CreateMarketingCampaign
commands.description: This event signifies the initiation of a new marketing campaign.

commands.name: UpdateMarketingCampaign
commands.description: This event indicates that an existing marketing campaign has been updated.

commands.name: LaunchMarketingCampaign
commands.description: This event represents the launch of a marketing campaign to the public.

commands.name: CompleteMarketingCampaign
commands.description: This event signifies the completion of a marketing campaign.

integrationPoints.name: Sales
integrationPoints.description: Sales context needs to be informed about new marketing campaigns.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerRelations
integrationPoints.description: Customer Relations might want insights on marketing campaigns to handle queries.
